title: He Hates Me
description: Once upon a time, there was a monster.When the night falls, he comes out to harvest souls.He’s silent and invisible —no one notices when he strikes then retreats to the shadows.Our paths shouldn’t have crossed, but they do.One day he sees me.Then he can’t unsee me.Once upon a time, there was a monster, a killer, a devil.My stalker.This is book is a dark stalker romance and contains dubious scenes.He Hates Me is part of a duet and is NOT standalone. The entire duet will be released two weeks apart.
author: Isabella Starling
